metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Remote Desktop in CPL?
metadata.email_text_clean:
Maybe ? 
Open the Start menu and type "optionalfeatures" in the search box 
Click on the search result to access the "Windows Features" window. 
Select "View features" next to "Add an optional feature" 
Locate the feature "Microsoft-Windows-TS-OptionalComponents-Package" in the
list. 
Check the box to enable the feature, then click "OK" to initiate the
installation.
%40DS0PR11MB8052.namprd11.prod.outlook.com

metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from buchananm@delawareareacc.org. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Maybe ? 
Open the Start menu and type "optionalfeatures" in the search box 
Click on the search result to access the "Windows Features" window. 
Select "View features" next to "Add an optional feature" 
Locate the feature "Microsoft-Windows-TS-OptionalComponents-Package" in the
list. 
Check the box to enable the feature, then click "OK" to initiate the
installation.
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/DS0PR11MB805242CAF17980930086BFD9C5B0A%40DS0PR11MB8052.namprd11.prod.outlook.com
